meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>dirt</radical> needs a  <radical>clown</radical> in it if you want to <kanji>cultivate</kanji> good crops. Clowns act as a natural fertilizer, and this will make it super easy to cultivate any crops you could ever want in this dirt. Isn't nature amazing?
readingMnemonic: Before you can start this whole <kanji>cultivation</kanji> process however, you have to say <reading>bye</reading> (ばい) to the clown. Say bye to him, then bash his head in, and drop him in the dirt.
